channel.title: Comments on: Not Censored. Thank You Everyone!
channel.description: BDSM, books and missing links by Xiao Yingtai

item.title: By: Xiao Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Xiao Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/not-censored-thank-you-everyone/#comment-892">Lace Winter</a>.
That is pretty scary! I can’t really blame her for acting on her convictions, but I do wish I could sit down and answer her questions for half an hour. Though I have to admit there is something to the theory that witch-hunters are the ones who have the most to hide, so maybe there would be no point. Brr!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lace Winter.

That is pretty scary! I can’t really blame her for acting on her convictions, but I do wish I could sit down and answer her questions for half an hour. Though I have to admit there is something to the theory that witch-hunters are the ones who have the most to hide, so maybe there would be no point. Brr!

item.title: By: Lace Winter
item.dc:creator: Lace Winter
item.description: I get the impression that the one causing you such heartache in your forum posting was behind most of the witch-hunting, though I don't know that for certain. She is the reason I no longer participate in the forums -- she's scary.
item.content:encoded: I get the impression that the one causing you such heartache in your forum posting was behind most of the witch-hunting, though I don’t know that for certain. She is the reason I no longer participate in the forums — she’s scary.

item.title: By: Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/not-censored-thank-you-everyone/#comment-96">Anonymous</a>.
Thanks! I'll have to think about that.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Anonymous.

Thanks! I’ll have to think about that.

item.title: By: Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/not-censored-thank-you-everyone/#comment-98">Nancy</a>.
LOL! Believe it or not, calligraphy makes my neck hurt, not my hands. And blogging is more likely to make me gasp for breath. Isn't the human body strange? Thank goodness I'm finally getting treatment that works.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nancy.

LOL! Believe it or not, calligraphy makes my neck hurt, not my hands. And blogging is more likely to make me gasp for breath. Isn’t the human body strange? Thank goodness I’m finally getting treatment that works.

item.title: By: Nancy
item.dc:creator: Nancy
item.description: No wonder your little hands hurt all the time. Between blogging and calligraphy, the stress has to be extreme.
item.content:encoded: No wonder your little hands hurt all the time. Between blogging and calligraphy, the stress has to be extreme.

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
"This above all: to thine own self be true."
Your calligraphy is exceptional. You should utilize it in the headlines to your posts.
item.content:encoded:
“This above all: to thine own self be true.”

Your calligraphy is exceptional. You should utilize it in the headlines to your posts.

item.title: By: Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/not-censored-thank-you-everyone/#comment-91">Ferns</a>.
It pains me so much to decline the very first request! Although it’s true that I only promised to respond to orders. :p And I would happily write obscenities for pay, it’s just that that’s one order I wouldn’t ask permission to display on this blog.
How about a compromise? <a href="http://www.pangloss.com/seidel/Shaker/" rel="nofollow">Shakespearean insults?</a> My favourite so far is “Methink’st thou art a general offence and every man should beat thee.”
Where’s my red ink?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ferns.

It pains me so much to decline the very first request! Although it’s true that I only promised to respond to orders. :p And I would happily write obscenities for pay, it’s just that that’s one order I wouldn’t ask permission to display on this blog.

How about a compromise? Shakespearean insults? My favourite so far is “Methink’st thou art a general offence and every man should beat thee.”

Where’s my red ink?

item.title: By: Yingtai
item.dc:creator: Yingtai
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/not-censored-thank-you-everyone/#comment-92">nagadikandang</a>.
LOL! Thank you. I wonder if your huzzah was what made me think of suggesting Shakespearean insults to Ferns?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to nagadikandang.

LOL! Thank you. I wonder if your huzzah was what made me think of suggesting Shakespearean insults to Ferns?

item.title: By: nagadikandang
item.dc:creator: nagadikandang
item.description: Huzzah! Look forward to future ergonomic blogging :)
item.content:encoded: Huzzah! Look forward to future ergonomic blogging :)

item.title: By: Ferns
item.dc:creator: Ferns
item.description:
Glad it went so smoothly. And yes, that calligraphy is lovely.
I laughed at <a href="http://imgur.com/gallery/xfac6" rel="nofollow">this gifset</a> the other day. I'd love to see a whole bunch of sweary abuse hand written with beautiful penmanship :P.
Ferns
item.content:encoded:
Glad it went so smoothly. And yes, that calligraphy is lovely.

I laughed at this gifset
the other day. I’d love to see a whole bunch of sweary abuse hand written with beautiful penmanship :P.

Ferns
